Package net.atos.kawwaportal.components.components

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionsDropDown
    Test
    ArticleOrganizer
    This Component is used to call tab serie containing image-links of articles.
    Breadcrumb  
    CollapsiblePanel  
    DeliveryForm
    This Component is used to generate a delivery form that will provide: A delivery mode radio list A delivery location radio list A google map linked to the location radio list To use it, call the component as the following:
    "<div t:type="kawwa2/DeliveryForm" t:currentDeliveryModesList="<<1>>" t:deliveryModeSelected="prop:<<2>>" t:deliveryLocationSelected="prop:<<3>>" t:gMapParameters="prop:<<4>>"/>"

    The fields must be filled with: <<1>> : The list of deliveryMode objects <<2>> : The name of the mode reference variable returned on submit <<3>> : The name of the location reference variable returned on submit <<4>> : The optional JSON Object that will parameter the gmap plugin
    GMap Deprecated
    This component will be removed in a future version compatible with Tapestry 5.4.
    GMapSelect
    This Component is used to generate a location form that will provide: A delivery location radio list A google map linked to the location radio list To use it, call the component as the following:
    "<div t:type="kawwa2/GMapSelect" t:currentGMapSelectLocationsList="<<1>>" t:gMapSelectLocationSelected="prop:<<2>>"/>"

    The fields must be filled with: <<1>> : The list of GMapSelectLocation objects <<2>> : The name of the location reference variable returned on submit
    Kawwa2Grid  
    Kawwa2Nav  
    Kawwa2Pager  
    LanguageSelection  
    Layout  
    ListOfActions
    Components used to display a list of links.
    MainNav  
    ProductGallery  
    Rating
    This Component is used to call RadioGgroup displayed as a Star Rating

    To use it, call the component with '< t:kawwa2.rating t:ratingCriteria="currentCriteria" t:criteriaDefinition="getCriteriaDefinitionByRatingCriteria(currentCriteria)" t:renderMode="renderMode" />'.
    RatingForm
    This Component is used to call a rating form that will provide 3 types of fields One field "title" to record the title of the rating One field "comment" to record the full comment of the rating Multiple fields of "rate" to record the rate of each criteria specified To use it, call the component with '<div t:type="kawwa2/RatingForm" t:id="ratingForm" t:rating="rating" t:criteriasDefinition="criteriasDefinition"/>'.
    RatingReviews
    This Component is used to provide a list of reviews.
    ResponsiveMainNav  
    SiteSearch  
    Test  
    Tree
    A component used to render a recursive tree structure, with expandable/collapsable/selectable nodes.
